text: I agree. I would love to do a river cruise with them. Ironically, I was thinking about doing a cruise to Norway this summer. I would imagine those prices will drop like a rock at this point.
author: RussOnPolitics

text: Wow. Scary. And Viking Cruises is considered among the best, most luxurious cruise lines. #VikingSky

text:

author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Every time Mayor Pete opens his mouth, he does himself a favor.   

I like the cut of his Buttigjib. 

See what I did there?
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
More shoes to drop. More indictments to come.

The seeds have been planted.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
The #MuellerReport was the opening act...and it was a fascinating one...dozens of indictments and guilty pleas. 

And the investigations into Trump continue at the SDNY -- this is where it's always been the most dangerous.

I sense there will be a lot of leaks here.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Stephen Moore is not an expert. He's basically just a TV pundit who advocates for Donald Trump's economic policies. 

He's a quack and eccentric who once led the fringe Club for Growth.

On CNN, he makes up facts. He's an ideologue. He doesn't belong at the Fed.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:

#MuellerReport

text:

#MuellerReport

Remember: Al Capone only went to jail for tax evasion.

text:

text:

The Sunday morning news shows will be spin city on steroids. I imagine we'll have an inkling of what's in the Mueller report by then.

Leaks and leakers abound!
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Another good point: Dems control the House. Congressman Adam Schiff will not leave any stone (Roger or other) unturned.

The Mueller report may be in, but this story isn't over. 

The next page of history waits to be written.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Important point here: Just because Robert Mueller submitted his long-awaited report does NOT mean more indictments are not coming...including that of Don Jr.

Could be sealed indictments.

Buckle up for the wild finish!
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
It's happening!

I can hardly believe it's finally here...the Mueller report is going to remain secret for now, but next week is going to be insane. 

Thank you Robert Mueller...he's been thorough.

Donald Trump will be trembling as he hits golf balls this week.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Whoa! It's here!

Robert Mueller has finished his investigation and submitted his report to AG Bill Barr, according to a letter Barr submitted to congressional lawmakers.

For now the document is secret, as required by federal regulations. 

Open it up!

https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/zoetillman/robert-mueller-report-trump-campaign-russia …

text:

text:

text:

Republicans love to trot out these maps that show seas of red. But some counties in Texas, for example, have less than 1,000 people.
author: RussOnPolitics

Nobody defines "access journalism" better than this Fox Business News hack.

text:

text:

For every Ilhan Omar among Dems, there's a Donald Trump, Steve King, and Jerry Falwell Jr among Republicans.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Most American Jews despise Donald Trump, absolutely.

But I know of none who think he's "their existential threat." That's an exaggeration of people's concerns. 

A threat to our democracy, yes.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
I will fix the headline for you: "Trump stole $1.3 million of donor money to give to his businesses"

It's a cult, folks.

text: I’m fully aware of what he did in Kansas City 25-30 years ago. There are also a bunch of women who say he sexually harassed them. The answer is no.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:

author: RussOnPolitics

text:

But still...yuck.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:

author: RussOnPolitics

author: RussOnPolitics

text:

These two criminals are thick as thieves.

author: RussOnPolitics

text:
What Donald Trump is saying about the Golan Heights is just about playing interference in the Israeli elections in April.

As bad as what Russia did to us, but this is out in the open.

Israel MUST turn the page.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Make no mistake about it. Donald Trump is saying we should recognize Israel’s annexation of the Golan Heights because he’s desperate to reelect PM Benjamin Netanyahu next month.

This is as bad as Russia hijacking our election, except that it is out in the open.

Dangerous.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:

Just a nasty person with no redeeming qualities.

And no, trying to keep his criminal kids out of jail at all costs does not constitute a plus, since he's also doing that to protect himself.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:

And if Biden doesn't win the nomination, it's unlikely another candidate would pick her -- especially if the nominee is a woman.

Shut out of 2020.

text:

I'd be all for Stacey Abrams as Joe Biden's pick for VP. Electrifying choice.

The quickest way to an Abrams presidency is a Biden presidency.

text:
I don’t love it. It reminds me of something one might find on a poster in 1930s Germany.

Clearly this was not Secretary Castro’s intention.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Lynn, do your job...being a validator for white Republicans who are accused of racism.

And lead the policy for serious people.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Donald Trump is a miserable person.

A failure as a businessman, failure as President, failure as a husband, failure as a dad, and failure as a human being.

I try to find the good in all people -- even among the worst people in history -- but Trump really is without any.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Rod Rosenstein is staying at the Department of Justice indefinitely.

Folks, he's not staying to cash in. He's staying to make sure justice is done, I believe.

Let's see if Donald Trump acts against him. This will freak him out.
author: RussOnPolitics

text: You spelled “dictator” wrong.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
If Kellyanne Conway had any dignity whatsoever, she would immediately resign after her boss Donald Trump called her husband and father of her children “a total loser.”

But her addiction to the spotlight and trappings of power will prevent that.

She is soulless. Without honor.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Sen. Elizabeth Warren is right...and I think Al Gore and Hillary Clinton would agree with her.

Time to do away with the Electoral College ASAP.

It's an antiquated way of electing a President. 

I am tired of hearing what "the Founders wanted." It's not their country anymore.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Come on, Tom Ford! 

Sure Melania Trump dabbled in birtherism, was callous towards kids locked in cages, ignores her husband's bullying, does nothing all day, and likely married Donald Trump just for his money and fame, but...

I swear I had a "but" 200 characters ago!
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
How many more chances are Republican leaders going to give Congressman Steve King? The man is a public danger. 

Fantasizing about another American Civil War is not acceptable.

Removing him from House committees is not strong enough action.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
It must be great to live high and mighty in Brazil like Glenn Greenwald and watch your country burn from afar. 

He is so far left that he is ended up on the right. Watching a gay man like that yuck it up with a homophobe like Laura Ingraham is horrible.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Absolutely. Senator Elizabeth Warren is right. The Electoral College is an antiquated way to pick a president. It’s time for one person to equal one vote. 

I’ll say it again: she is good at campaigning.

Just knock on her head and an idea pops out.

#WarrenTownHall
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
She isn’t my first or second choice, but Senator Elizabeth Warren is really off to a strong start. 

There were some doubts last fall, but she has proven the naysayers wrong.

#WarrenTownHall
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
I remember vividly in high school being marked incorrect when I selected "slavery" as the major reason for the cause of the Civil War. It was multiple choice. I was told the correct choice was "states' rights." 

I thought that was bulls**t when I was 16 and it's bulls**t now.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
How many more smoking guns about Donald Trump's shady finances do we need?

He's a con man. A liar. A cheat.

Story after story shows us that his finances are one giant house of cards. 

It's not an empire. It's a shanty town.
author: RussOnPolitics

text: Tim Apple says "hey."
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
It seems Congressman Devin Nunes constantly looks for new ways to embarrass himself and the people of #CA22 -- suing Twitter and select Twitter users for anti-conservative "shadow bans."

I can't believe he thought this was a good idea. He must be about to quit Congress.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Senator Roy Blunt, a longtime Republican leader in Missouri, was just shunned by a local GOP organization for daring to disobey Donald Trump.

So not only will disagreeing with the President invite a primary challenger, but it will get you disinvited from some silly luncheon.
author: RussOnPolitics

text: Liu...he said the new results don't tell us anything we don't already know.
author: RussOnPolitics

text: Liu doesn't see it as drastic...he sees this as "more of the same," it seems from his quotes.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Albany sees changing the specialized high school admissions process as "a political loser."

And chairman of the state Senate Education Committee in particular doesn't want to see the #SHSAT done away with. That pretty much ends the debate unless something drastic changes.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Slide to the left? More like slide toward balance.

I haven't seen this many cable news viewers upset since CNN hired a former GOP operative/Trump Justice Department official as politics editor.

Donna Brazile is stoking similar pushback...this time among Fox News conservatives.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
This racist piece of trash in Connecticut has been forced to resign from her job working in a school district. 

She ruined her life and brought shame to her family.

Hate has consequences.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
A new @SienaResearch poll finds Congresswoman Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez with only a 31% favorability rating with voters across New York State. 44% view her unfavorably. 

Note: It is really hard to be a Democrat in New York and NOT be above water. 

https://scri.siena.edu/2019/03/18/2-3-of-voters-say-amazon-cancelling-queens-hq-bad-for-ny/ …
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Donald Trump and Fox News have been hammering and undermining the Mueller investigation for months. 

Mueller gets to say nothing...until he files charges.

This in itself is obstruction of justice.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
I haven't seen this many cable TV news viewers lose it since CNN said they was going to hire former GOP operative/Trump Justice Department official Sarah Isgur Flores as politics editor.

Donna Brazile is stoking similar pushback...this time among Fox News conservatives.
author: RussOnPolitics

text: My deepest condolences to you and your family, Soledad. This has been an awful 2019 for you.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Who's more upset that Donna Brazile is joining Fox News? Loyal conservative viewers of the state TV network or loyal Democrats?

Honestly, this was a long time coming.

Remember that #SNL skit with Leslie Jones?

"I will destroy all of this."
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
“Biden’s team has started gaming out scenarios for what a campaign launch could look like with Wilmington, Delaware, & Scranton, Pennsylvania, where Biden was born, among several potential locations floated for an announcement rally."

Go with Scranton!

https://edition.cnn.com/2019/03/18/politics/joe-biden-endorsements-message-2020/index.html …
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
I think Donna Brazile can be an effective Democrat on Fox News if she's a pit bull and talks the same way she'd talk on MSNBC.

However, if she takes the Alan Colmes/Bob Beckel approach, then her presence becomes a disaster.

That must have been some contract they offered her.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Meghan McCain in March 2019: “I genuinely feel bad for his family. I can’t imagine having a father that does this on the weekends.”

Meghan McCain in March 2020 (maybe/probably): "Donald Trump deserves reelection."

Seen this before.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Emerson College survey shows Joe Biden leading Donald Trump by 8 points in Wisconsin. 

Bernie Sanders and Elizabeth Warren also lead Trump, but only by 4. Too close for comfort.

For me, this choice is about electability. Everything else is secondary.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
A new Emerson College survey shows Joe Biden leading Donald Trump by 8 points in Wisconsin. 

Bernie Sanders and Elizabeth Warren also lead Trump, but only by 4. Too close for comfort.

For me, this choice is about electability. All else is secondary.

https://thehill.com/homenews/campaign-polls/434513-poll-trump-trails-biden-sanders-warren-in-wisconsin …
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Extremism -- white nationalists, Islamist radicals, whatever -- is the Black Plague of modern times.

Condemn the perpetrators, mourn the victims, but don't blame an entire group of people.

Everyone in Utrecht and the Netherlands suffers from this massacre.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Extremism -- white nationalists, Islamist radicals, whatever -- is the Black Plague of modern times.

Condemn the perpetrators, mourn the victims, but don't blame an entire group of people.

Everyone in Utrecht and the Netherlands suffers from this horrific attack.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Yowzer.

Beto O’Rourke’s campaign said it raised a whopping $6.1 million in the first 24 hours after his presidential campaign announcement, beating out all other Dem contenders.

That's a respectable amount for a Senate candidate for an entire year.

https://www.huffpost.com/entry/beto-orourke-24-hours-fundraising-record_n_5c8f7d31e4b0d7f6b0f5b082 …
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
I think this is the song that Donald Trump is rocking out to this morning.

It was sad, but charming on "Crazy Ex-Girlfriend" when Rebecca did it. But it's just sad when it's the President.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Another grim Monday. Prayers for Utrecht and its people.

Whoever did it: white supremacists or Islamic extremists, or whoever, terrorism is pure evil and should be universally condemned. Full stop.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Busted. Federal authorities raided the office of Republican fundraiser and ex-RNC finance chair Elliott Broidy last year for ties to foreign nationals.

They were searching for any ties to China, Saudi Arabia, and a Miami Beach club promoter.

This is one thick Trumpian swamp!
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
I agree that all of us should be worried about Donald Trump’s psychological state. I think for too long we have sort of shrugged our shoulders or smirked at his behavior because it seemed “normal” for him.

But he is a public menace. And he has been for years. Not cute.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
White nationalism is a clear and present danger everywhere. 

Imagine for a minute that these members of the U.S. military belonged to an Islamic extremist group. 

Coverage on Fox News would be breathless. And Trump would be tweeting so furiously that his fingers would go numb.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
White nationalism is a clear and present danger globally. 

What other smoking gun do we need before we get serious about this? 

Imagine for a minute that these members of the U.S. military belonged to an Islamic extremist group.

The coverage on Fox News would be breathless.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
White nationalism is a clear and present danger in the US and across the world. 

What other smoking gun do we need before we get serious about this issue? Imagine for a minute that these members of the military belonged to an Islamic extremist group.

Bonkers.
author: RussOnPolitics

text: You have one ugly Twitter feed, George. I don’t think God wants your “love.”
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Sorry. But I won't play your racist "white guys can't have an opinion about anything" game. 

Read her Twitter feed. It's full of antisemitic and bigoted crap.

I call out racism and rudeness no matter the source.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
True: John McCain lives rent free in Donald Trump's head.

Also true: Meghan McCain is only famous because of her mom's money and dad's heroism.

Also true: Meghan McCain will be back on board the Trump crazy train before the end of the month.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Note: Professional villain Jack Posobiec tweeted this and Donald Trump RTed it.

Our President thinks white supremacy isn't a real problem.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
I have not seen this level of agitation or panic in Trump for a while. In past 24 hours, he has:

1. Begged Fox News to rehire Jeanine Pirro (he knows he needs her to defend him)
2. Smeared the late, heroic John McCain
3. Attacked the legality of the Mueller probe

He's SCARED!
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Will any Republican pol of Irish heritage condemn this Republican attack against Beto O’Rourke? Do they even care? 

Or maybe they will just tweet their “concern” and then delete it a few hours later because they are afraid of offending Donald Trump.

Pathetic. Predictable.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
This kind of bigoted attack on Beto O'Rourke is something I'd expect to see in politics in 1928.

Shocking the GOP would engage in anti-Irish tropes in 2019.

Or is it?

First they came for the Muslim...then they came for the Jews...

Who's next?
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
OK, but she ambushed Chelsea Clinton before the threats. I will say those threats are totally wrong. I condemn them. Full stop.

BTW, you don't think the anti-Israel movement is infested with hatred of Jews? Really?
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Nope. Actually I was respectful to people who paid my family mourning calls, Always.

And don't pull that tired "white people have no right to comment" crap on me. I won't remain silent when I see bigotry and rudeness.

The NYU student was awful even before this. Rage is her MO.
author: RussOnPolitics
RussOnPolitics

text:
Donald Trump is going after John McCain. The American hero has been dead for months and Trump still cannot let him rest is peace.

Trump is just a horrible human being, with no empathy.

What kind of person still supports Trump? A person I wouldn’t want to be friends with.
author: RussOnPolitics

text: She was a bigot for this. We all mourn this horrible loss of life at the hands of white supremacists. But I have zero time for your racist bulls**t.
author: RussOnPolitics

text: When I say hopeless, I mean in terms of a Dem winning statewide.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
You don't try to change hearts and minds with her kind of hateful, nasty, divisive language. 

Maybe it's good therapy for her, but it hurts her cause.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Donald Trump is demanding that lunatic Judge Jeanine be allowed back on the air.

This comes after she slandered Congresswoman Ilhan Omar's Muslim faith...and a day after dozens of Muslims were massacred in New Zealand just for being Muslim.

Donald Trump is just a horrible man.
author: RussOnPolitics

text: Read her Twitter feed. She is a hateful, antisemitic troll. She calls for the destruction of Israel. She’s not somebody to engage with.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
She is my home state senator and I voted for her three times, but what about the past two months of “exploring” has convinced Kirsten Gillibrand that she can run a top tier campaign? 

Example: The New York State Democratic establishment is not on board. No endorsements.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Donald Trump is going after John McCain. The American hero has been dead for months and Trump still cannot let this man rest is peace.

Trump is just a horrible human being, with no empathy.

What kind of person still supports Trump? A person I wouldn’t want to know, that’s who.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Does Stacey Abrams really think she's more likely to win the presidency than a Senate seat in 2020? I don't think she does. However if she wants to raise her name ID and issues, I get it.

Am I such a huge fan. If she runs for #GAsen, I am dropping some money to her immediately.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
If America is ever to get over its cancerous Islamophobia, it won't be because of anything you say or do. 

Your tactics and anger only feed into the cycle of hatred, sadly.

You and your friend both have much growing up to do. 

Stop with the performance art and go to class.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
NYU activist who ambushed Chelsea Clinton while friend recorded it doubles down on tactics and demands she apologize to Ilhan Omar for calling out her Antisemitism.

The student's sidekick is an Israeli-born Jew who supports BDS and one-state solution.

https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/leendweik/why-we-confronted-chelsea-clinton?fbclid=IwAR08eh2FyLFUkoKDMa6rEzuB50AB1Tcxbp7ZdW_cGuDFqD2dNZMawg8gxj4 …
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Let's make a deal.

Let's banish both Donald Trump AND Meghan McCain.

We'll all be smarter and better off without looking at either one of these poster children of white privilege.

Meghan will be back to supporting Trump heart and soul in about two weeks.

Happens every time.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Vice President Joe Biden has to finally realize that this is not the Republican Party of 1973 when he entered the United States Senate. This “we can all get along if we just talk” stuff is not what the Dem base wants to hear.

It’s just not true and it’s just not realistic.
author: RussOnPolitics

text: Then why doesn’t he run for governor of Indiana first? It’s because he thinks he has a better shot at becoming president, I guess.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
It’s unfortunate that Mayor Buttigieg is from Indiana. He so talented. But there’s really nowhere for him to go at this point. 

The Hoosier State has become so hopelessly red. Democrats are just not competitive at the statewide level anymore. It’s the White House or bust.
author: RussOnPolitics

text: It was charming and honorable how Congressman Crenshaw showed impressive grace over that SNL smear. But always remember that he is still just another conservative Republican who will always show fealty to Donald Trump.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Look at all those big hats and white skin. Donald Trump does not even try to pretend to not be exclusionary.

Every event in the Oval Office is like some sort of cult ritual. It’s so bizarre and so unsettling.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Wrong again, doctor.

This Berniebrat was in the wrong and she deserves to be called out for her behavior toward Chelsea Clinton. 

She has been harassing public leaders for a while: from Henry Kissinger to Bill de Blasio.

She also calls Israel's destruction is "a solution."
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Wow! Donald Trump is going after John McCain. The American hero has been dead for months. And Trump still cannot let this man rest is peace.

There is ZERO reason to go after him like this. None. 

Trump is just a horrible human being, with no empathy and no honor.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Call him by his name.

Brave #eggboy is 17-year-old William Connolly.

He's the hero we have, but we don't deserve him.

Can someone send him Steve King's address? We can crowdfund his airplane ticket to western Iowa. First class!
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Natalie, I encourage you to read the tweets of this young woman who ambushed Chelsea Clinton. 

This is her MO. She’s in a constant state of agreivenent, hate, and anger. Mostly towards Israel and Jews. It is performance art for her. 

She has a lot of growing up to do.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Nobody gets off on attacking fellow Jews the way Glenn Greenwald does. It’s sickening. It’s almost a knee-jerk reaction for him.

The Berniebrat who ambushed Chelsea Clinton last night outright calls for the destruction of Israel.

That's not free speech. That's hate speech.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
The Berniebrat who ambushed Chelsea Clinton last night is a bigot. Candidly, she probably should not even be allowed to remain at NYU.

Look at this tweet from a few weeks ago. She outright calls for the destruction of Israel.

That's not free speech. That's hate speech.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Correct. #eggboy is a hero. You are not. Stop trying to play the victim. The real victims are the nearly 50 Muslims who were massacred by white supremacists.

The white young man egged a bonafide racist; you ambushed Chelsea Clinton, who is not a racist.

There's a distinction.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Leen Dweik, the NYU student who ambushed Chelsea Clinton, has a history of ambushing politicians she doesn't like: from Henry Kissinger to Bill de Blasio.

Usually her targets are Jews or pro-Israel folks.

 It's performance art for her.

She's also active in the BDS moment.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Congressman Steve King listening to and watching racist Australian Senator Fraser Anning and thinking:

"I like the cut of his jib."
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
I am in awe of #eggboy -- look at this young man. The precision, the serenity, the bravery.

He literally took his life in his hands when he egged the odious Australian politician Fraser Anning.

Look at those thugs who tried to choke him out. Criminal.

This kid is a champ.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
I put it together.

1. Chelsea Clinton is married to a Jew

2. She stated that Ilhan Omar needs to be more careful with her words

Therefore, she's a Zionist shill who contributed to the New Zealand massacre. Is that right?

The Berniebrat who ambushed her does this stuff often.
author: RussOnPolitics

text: This is also true.
author: RussOnPolitics

text: Chelsea Clinton is probably better on her worst day than you are on your best day.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
What I find strange is that the Democratic Party is somehow big enough to accommodate people like me, but also accommodate this angry, ignorant brat who attacks a pregnant Chelsea Clinton who came to an event to mourn 50 Muslims who were massacred.

Weird times.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
We had the Berniebros. This ignorant young lady has given birth to a new creature: the Berniebrats.

I did a quick Google search. Leen Dweik basically slams and confronts lots of folks...from Henry Kissinger to Bill de Blasio.

Also very active in BDS movement.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
So I am putting it together now:

1. Chelsea Clinton is married to a Jew
2. She tweeted that Ilhan Omar needs to be more careful with her words
3. She seems supportive of Israel

Therefore, she's is a Zionist shill who contributed to the the New Zealand massacre.

Is that right?
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
I will call out stupidity and ignorance in any person who displays it. Regardless of race or gender. Not to do that is both racist and sexist. 

And this includes the young lady who went ballistic on Chelsea Clinton out of pain and frustration.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Many of us on our best day are not as kind or as good as Chelsea Clinton is on her worst day. 

The hate against her is so ignorant and misguided that it is pathetic. To blame her for New Zealand is a new low.

It reminds me why I think Twitter is such a dark place sometimes.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Donald Trump Jr. may be elected president, alright — of his prison. Cell block C. 

Maybe.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
I came on to see why Chelsea Clinton was trending. 

I thought perhaps it was because she was pregnant or had a kid. But it’s because some ignoramus is blaming her for the massacre in New Zealand. 

If anybody thinks that Chelsea is part of the problem, you are the problem.
author: RussOnPolitics

text: Sadly, your friend is completely ignorant and wrong. I realize she is hurting, but Chelsea Clinton is not the enemy.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Congressman Joaquin Castro, the twin brother of presidential candidate Julian Castro, “is all but certain” to enter next year’s #TXsen race to take on incumbent Sen. John Cornyn, a source familiar with Castro’s thinking says.

Battleground Texas!

https://www.texasmonthly.com/politics/joaquin-castro-challenge-john-cornyn-senate-seat/ …
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
This was so beautiful. Maya Angelou later apologized to the young girl.

It takes a very big person to admit he/she is wrong in public.

She's a queen. Always.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
When I was in college, we paid Maya Angelou to come speak. She was magnificent. 

I do recall her contract was REALLY specific.

I remember that part of the contract specified that no fish could be cooked anywhere on campus for two or three days leading up to the speech.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
This is what leadership looks like.

#NewZealandShooting
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
That Donald Trump only mentioned issues related to Israel makes me think that he believes the anti-Semitic trope of dual loyalty.

That Jews would become Republicans solely based on policy toward Israel and his loyalty to the Likud Party is insulting and obtuse.
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
I know, I know! 

Because they are bigoted hypocrites. 

#NewZealandShooting
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
Donald Trump would never condemn white supremacist terror in the way that the prime minister of New Zealand did.

He doesn't have it within him.

The white supremacists think he's one of them.

#NewZealandShooting
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
New Zealand's Fraser Anning is a horrible human being. He once used the term "final solution" when discussing immigration. 

He makes Congressman Steve King seem empathetic...though they are two sides of the same coin.

#NewZealandShooting
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
A perfunctory, icy message about nearly 50 Muslims in New Zealand being murdered by white supremacists...now back to Trump's cynical strategy of appealing to his base.

Note: Trump's language is similar to the language used by the New Zealand murderers.

#NewZealandShooting
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
More shoes to drop.

Special counsel Robert Mueller and attorneys for ex-Trump campaign aide Richard Gates on Friday asked a federal judge to further postpone his sentencing on account of cooperation in “several ongoing investigations.”

Buckle up.

https://thehill.com/policy/national-security/434213-former-trump-aide-still-cooperating-on-several-ongoing-probes …
author: RussOnPolitics

text:
This is how a REAL President extends his condolences. Thank you, Barack Obama.

Reminder: Just the other day, Donald Trump issued a veiled threat that "tough" bikers and soldiers would go after his opponents if necessary.

#NewZealandShooting
author: RussOnPolitics
